title: Kazakhstan Five-Star Almaty City Break near Ile-Alatau National Park
description: Experience a five-star mountainside escape at InterContinental Almaty, an IHG Hotel, perfectly located in Kazakhstan's park-filled cultural capital. Resting in the shadow of the snow-capped Ile-Alatau Mountain National Park, this hotel offers the perfect base to launch into Kazakhstan’s best skiing and hiking. When you’re not on the slopes, head to Bosphorus Restaurant for authentic Ottoman cuisine or the elegant leather and mahogany of J Bar for coffee or cognac.
